title: Keep Your Aims High: The Science and Practice of Goal Setting
author: Raghav D. Joshi
bookDescription: “Keep Your Aims: High The Science and Practice of Goal Setting ” is not just about dreaming big—it teaches a scientific, practical, and proven process to turn those dreams into reality.  This book makes it clear that success is not accidental; it is the result of intentional and well-designed goal setting. Drawing from modern psychology, behavioral science, and real-world examples, the book explains how clear, measurable, and meaningful goals align your thoughts, emotions, and actions in a single direction.  Through powerful frameworks such as SMART, WOOP, and OKRs, readers learn how to break large visions into small, actionable steps. The book goes beyond goal setting and addresses real challenges like procrastination, fear of failure, self-doubt, and external obstacles—offering practical strategies to overcome them. With insights into digital tools, tracking systems, accountability, and adaptability, it is deeply relevant to today’s fast-changing world.  Whether you want to advance your career, create balance in your personal life, or transform your aspirations into a clear action plan, this book helps you build your personal goal-setting blueprint.  High goals are not achieved by wishful thinking—they are achieved through the right mindset, the right systems, and consistent action. This book marks the beginning of that journey.
